bibl.title: Old and New Papyri from the Estate of Lady Victorina.
Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P.Gascou)

bibl.note: The 3 documents belong to a dossier of 5 papyri related to the estate of Lady Victorina who lived somewhere in Egypt between 550 and 650. - P. Ryl. Inv. Greek Add. 1150 = P. Gascou 44. Order to deliver wheat. Provenance unknown, mid-6th - mid-7th c. - P. Herm. 42 = P. Gascou 45. Receipt for payment in gold. Provenance unknown, mid-6th - mid-7th c. - P. Berol. Inv. 9083 = P. Gascou 46. Receipt for payment in money. Provenance unknown, mid-6th - mid-7th c. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Berol. Inv. 9083 = P. Gascou 46 P. Ryl. Inv. Greek Add. 1150 = P. Gascou 44 145.4 P. Herm. 42 = P. Gascou 45
Roberta Mazza, Old and New Papyri from the Estate of Lady Victorina.
Jean-Luc Fournet & Arietta Papaconstantinou (edd.), Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P. Gascou) = TravMém 20 (2016) 1, pp. 277-283, 3 figg.; - 659.

The 3 documents belong to a dossier of 5 papyri related to the estate of Lady Victorina who lived somewhere in Egypt between 550 and 650. - P. Ryl. Inv. Greek Add. 1150 = P. Gascou 44. Order to deliver wheat. Provenance unknown, mid-6th - mid-7th c. - P. Herm. 42 = P. Gascou 45. Receipt for payment in gold. Provenance unknown, mid-6th - mid-7th c. - P. Berol. Inv. 9083 = P. Gascou 46. Receipt for payment in money. Provenance unknown, mid-6th - mid-7th c. - Avec résumé en anglais.
